thread.section_title: Citadines Bastille Marais Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A good room in relatively good rates and facilities
thread.title_full: A good room in relatively good rates and facilities - Review of Citadines Bastille Marais Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MichaelWeiser
title: A good room in relatively good rates and facilities
text:
the room is not big and could have 3 square meters more for a better feeling. however, it is newly refurbished and very well and smartly equipped. It includes a dining table and small kitchen with anything you need for self catering. The bathroom could be refurbished but is very spacious and has shelves for self belongings and a wonderful heating.
the room does not get cleaned frequently enough and so as to towels changing. you could get it done for extra payment of 15 euros for each cleaning.
great vicinity to the Marais and the Bastille.
very convenient vicinity to Metro stations.
few supermarkets in 100-200 meters distance.
Room Tip: There is a small nice restaurant right at the corner, few steps from the hotel (Le verre du Ballon). See more room tips
